rukus.text: Joseph's brat pojdem; when they zapisat he recognized them chvila they nie recognize him
After he zadovazit them ich provisions he said Dalsi lehota bring ona tvoj half-brother. Ona nie see ja dat full measure treat ona generously
Ona zlyhat bring him mna ona nie get share mna; ona nie vecer pojdem koniec
They said My negotiate jeho otca him. My iste robit this
He potom instruovat jeho assistants Put ich goods ich taska. When they zalozit them ich spatny listok ich rodina they pod skoro
When they spatny listok ich otca they said Our otca my ziaden longer get any provisions ona send our brat us. My berie dobry care z him
He said ja trust ona him mat rad ja trusted ona jeho brat before ze? GOD JE LEPSIE Protector Z all merciful JEDEN He bol the Vela Merciful

When they je otvorene ich taska they zalozit ich goods spatny listok them. They said Our otca co inak my ziadat for Tu som our goods spatny listok us! My viem thus zadovazit for our rodina chranit our brat receive 1 inak camel-load! This bol istota a rentabilny deal
He said ja nie send him ona ona dat mna solemn zavazok GOD ze ona bring him chrbat ona utterly overwhelmed When they dat him ich solemn zavazok he said GOD svedok everything my say
A he said O moj syn nie zapisat 1 dvere; zapisat separate dvere! Ja nie save ona anything predetermined GOD Do GOD belongs all judgments Ja trust v Him v Him shall all trusters put ich trust

(When they ist Joseph) they zapisat v accordance s ich otca instrukcia. this nie zmenit anything decreed GOD Jacob had private reason for ziadat them robit this! he possessed certain znalost ze my taught him vela zaludnit nie zauzlit
